error_auth.title: Woops!
error_auth.content: Can't play if you ain't authenticated!

fields.markdown: You’re invited to our exclusive Gold Rush Giveaway, where you’ll have the chance to dig up golden rewards, enjoy delicious food, and experience the thrill of winning big.

fields.label: Will you join us to strike gold?
range: Absolutely - looking forward to staking my claim!

fields.label: Will you bring a guest to share the riches?
range: No guest this time - more gold for me!

fields.label: If rooms are available, would you like someone to contact you regarding reservations?

MAIN.body_md:
# Thank you for your response! 

If you have any questions or need to make changes to your RSVP, please don't hesitate to get in touch. We hope to see you soon at **Colusa Casino Resort**.
